parameterdescription.para: Name of the module (provided by derived classes)
Type of the module (provided by derived classes)

detaileddescription.para: Perform any actions that need all of the devices to be initized beforehand - such as looking up an internet platform This function is guranteed to be called AFTER all modules have been constructed.

briefdescription.para: Package a modules measurements or state.

detaileddescription.para:
LoomManager iterates over modules to build complete configuration
json
Json configuration object to add to

briefdescription.para: Display the configuration settings of the module.
Display current state of the module.
Print the module name as a label.

detaileddescription.para: Used for matching debug prints to corresponding module

briefdescription.para: Get the device manager class if linked.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the LoomManager, Null if not linked

parameterdescription.para: The buffer to copy module name into

briefdescription.para: Get whether or not the module should be treated as active.

simplesect.para: Whether or not the module is active

briefdescription.para: Get the category of the module.
Add pointer back to device manager.

detaileddescription.para:
Generally only called when device manager links module to provide pointer both directions. Derived modules may override this for increased function, such as linking a submanager or RTC module.
LM
LoomManager to point to

briefdescription.para: Set print verbosity Controlls level of detail included in debug prints.

detaileddescription.para:
Controlls level of detail included in bundles
v
The verbosity setting

briefdescription.para: Set whether or not the module should be treated as active.

parameterdescription.para: Whether or not to enable module

briefdescription.para: Get string of name associated with verbosity enum.

parameterdescription.para: Verbosity value to get string representation of

briefdescription.para: Get string of the category associated with a Category.

parameterdescription.para: Category value to get string representation of

briefdescription.para: Enum to check against to when finding individual component managed by a LoomManager.

detaileddescription.para: Used because we cannot use dynamic_cast to check type of modules (rtti disabled by Arduino IDE)

Similar LoomModule::Type but represents the astract classes rather than the leaf node modules in the inheritance tree. For a given module, its category often shares a name with the abstract class it is derived from
LoomManager provides to any modules passed to add_module

briefdescription.para: The name of the module (Should have a DEFAULT but can be overriden if provided to constructor)
Whether or not the module should be treated as active.

detaileddescription.para: If inactive at setup (due to failed initialization, module will be deleted)

briefdescription.para: Abstract root of Loom component modules inheritance hierarchy.

detaileddescription.para: All modules in Loom inherit from LoomModule
